item.description:
Beginners welcome! This is a Pilates class that is modified to each person's ability. (& it's fun!)

Come work out & kick back from your stressful week with a 30 minute Pilates Mat class followed by a glass of Pinot Noir.

A fabulous way to transition into your weekend with a great workout & a little heart healthy red wine.

Pilates improves flexibility & strength giving you a full body workout. Proper breathing is emphasized contributing to stress reduction, & a centering mind/body connection.

E-mail bodybyconnie@gmail.com or call 617-840-9451 to reserve space.Â  RSVP here too so we can keep track and add a waiting list if there is a lot of interest!

Cost is $15
item.how_to_find_us: big pale yellow building on the left as you come on to Montvale from Main St in Stoneham on the 3rd floor suite 380
item.name: Pilates and Pinot Noir Class!!! Fun and good for you in more ways than one!
